languages.text: {n}Воин переходит на заговорщицкий шепот.{/n} "Хоть тело Астартес устроено так, чтобы не хмелеть, мы изобрели способ обойти сей запрет. Мьод, что мы варим, способен превозмочь даже нашу кровь. Оттого мы хмелеем, и пиры наши веселы. И Космические волки слывут самым веселым Орденом в Империуме!.. Эх... мьод... Нигде не сварить его, кроме как на старом добром Фенрисе. Нигде больше не растут столь ядовитые травы".

{n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин переходит на заговорщицкий шепот.{/n} "Хоть тело Астартес устроено так, чтобы не хмелеть, мы изобрели способ обойти сей запрет. Мьод, что мы варим, способен превозмочь даже нашу кровь. Оттого мы хмелеем, и пиры наши веселы. И Космические волки слывут самым веселым Орденом в Империуме!.. Эх... мьод... Нигде не сварить его, кроме как на старом добром Фенрисе. Нигде больше не растут столь ядовитые травы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. And the Space Wolves are famed as the most jovial order in the Imperium! Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. And the Space Wolves are famed as the most jovial order in the Imperium! Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. And the Space Wolves are famed as the most jovial order in the Imperium! Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法压低了声音，仿佛在酝酿阴谋一般。{/n}“尽管阿斯塔特修士的身体不会受任何饮料的影响，但我们发明了一种可以打破这个禁忌的方法。我们酿造的蜜酒，甚至足以战胜我们血脉中的力量。它会使我们酩酊大醉，让我们的宴会充满欢声笑语。啊……蜜酒……这种东西只能在美妙的芬里斯酿造，酿造这种酒的有毒植物只生长在芬里斯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法压低了声音，仿佛在酝酿阴谋一般。{/n}“尽管阿斯塔特修士的身体不会受任何饮料的影响，但我们发明了一种可以打破这个禁忌的方法。我们酿造的蜜酒，甚至足以战胜我们血脉中的力量。它会使我们酩酊大醉，让我们的宴会充满欢声笑语，我们太空野狼也被称为整个帝国最欢快的军团！啊……蜜酒……这种东西只能在美妙的芬里斯酿造，酿造这种酒的有毒植物只生长在芬里斯。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar baja a un tono conspirador:{/n} «Aunque el cuerpo de los Astartes está hecho para ser inmune a los efectos de la bebida, hemos encontrado una forma de saltarnos el tabú. El mjod que elaboramos puede abrumar incluso nuestra sangre. Nos emborracha y llena nuestras fiestas de jolgorio. Ah... mjod... solo se puede elaborar en Fenris. No hay otro mundo con plantas tan venenosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar baja a un tono conspirador:{/n} «Aunque el cuerpo de los Astartes está hecho para ser inmune a los efectos de la bebida, hemos encontrado una forma de saltarnos el tabú. El mjod que elaboramos puede abrumar incluso nuestra sangre. Nos emborracha y llena nuestras fiestas de jolgorio. ¡Los Lobos Espaciales somos la orden más jovial del Imperium! Ah... mjod... solo se puede elaborar en Fenris. No hay otro mundo con plantas tan venenosas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの声が囁くように小さくなる{/n}「アスタルテスの肉体は酒の影響を受けないようにできているが、俺達はこのタブーを回避する方法を発明した。俺達が醸造するミョードは、俺達の血液でさえも克服することができる。それは俺達を酔わせ、宴を陽気なものにする。ああ…ミョード…あれは、古き良きフェンリス以外では醸造できない。あのような毒草が生育している世界は他にはないんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの声が囁くように小さくなる{/n}「アスタルテスの肉体は酒の影響を受けないようにできているが、俺達はこのタブーを回避する方法を発明した。俺達が醸造するミードは、俺達の血液でさえも克服することができる。それは俺達を酔わせ、宴を陽気なものにする。ああ…ミード…あれは、古き良きフェンリス以外では醸造できない。あのような毒草が生育している世界は他にはないんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme wird zu einem verschwörerischen Flüstern:{/n} "Der Körper eines Astartes ist zwar dazu gemacht, immun gegen die Auswirkungen des Trinkens zu sein, doch wir haben einen Weg gefunden, dieses Tabu zu umgehen. Der Mjod, den wir brauen, kann selbst unser Blut überwinden. Er macht uns betrunken und unsere Gelage zu fröhlichen Anlässen. Ah ... Mjod ... Man kann ihn nur auf Fenris brauen, sonst nirgendwo. Keine andere Welt beheimatet solche giftigen Pflanzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Stimme wird zu einem verschwörerischen Flüstern:{/n} "Der Körper eines Astartes ist zwar dazu gemacht, immun gegen die Auswirkungen des Trinkens zu sein, doch wir haben einen Weg gefunden, dieses Tabu zu umgehen. Der Mjod, den wir brauen, kann selbst unser Blut überwinden. Er macht uns betrunken und macht unsere Gelage zu fröhlichen Anlässen. Und die Space Wolves sind als fröhlichster Orden des gesamten Imperiums bekannt! Ah ... Mjod ... Man kann ihn nur auf Fenris brauen, sonst nirgendwo. Keine andere Welt beheimatet solche giftigen Planzen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar se réduit à un murmure et son ton se fait confidentiel :{/n} « Si le corps d'un Astartes est censé être immunisé aux effets de l'alcool, nous avons trouvé un moyen de contourner ce tabou. Le mjod que nous brassons est capable d'altérer notre sang. Il nous enivre et rend nos banquets bien plus festifs. Ah... Le mjod... On ne peut en brasser nulle part ailleurs que sur ce bon vieux Fenris. Aucun autre monde n'abrite de plantes aussi toxiques. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar se réduit à un murmure et son ton se fait confidentiel :{/n} « Si le corps d'un Astartes est censé être immunisé aux effets de l'alcool, nous avons trouvé un moyen de contourner ce tabou. Le mjod que nous brassons est capable d'altérer notre sang. Il nous enivre et rend nos banquets bien plus festifs. Et les Space Wolves sont réputés comme étant l'ordre le plus jovial de tout l'Imperium ! Ah... Le mjod... On ne peut en brasser nulle part ailleurs que sur ce bon vieux Fenris. Aucun autre monde n'abrite de plantes aussi toxiques. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, entrikalı bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Astartes bedenleri, içkinin etkilerine bağışık olsa da bu engeli aşmanın bir yolunu keşfettik. Mayaladığımız mjod, bizim kanımıza bile karışabiliyor. Bizi sarhoş edip ziyafetlerimizi neşeli kılıyor. Ah be mjod... Fenris'imden başka yerde de mayalanmazsın ki. Başka hiçbir dünyada oradaki kadar zehirli bitkiler yoktur."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper:{/n} "Though the body of an Astartes is built to be immune to the effects of drink, we invented a way around this taboo. The mjod we brew can overcome even our blood. It makes us drunk, and makes our feasts jovial occasions. Ah... mjod... You can brew it nowhere else but on good old Fenris. No other world is home to such poisonous plants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, entrikalı bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor:{/n} "Astarteslerin bedeni, içkinin etkilerine karşı bağışık olsa da bu engeli aşmanın bir yolunu keşfettik. Mayaladığımız mjod, bizim kanımıza bile karışabiliyor. Bizi sarhoş edip ziyafetlerimizi neşeli bir hâle getiriyor. Ah... mjod... Fenris'imden başka yerde de mayalanmazsın ki. Başka hiçbir dünyada oradaki kadar zehirli bitkiler yok."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
